rationale: The segment provides factual statistics on cases, deaths, and condition ('critically ill' describes condition, not a risk-adjective modified by intensifier).
statement_text: China has reported 21 human infections with the H5N6 subtype of avian influenza in 2021 to the World Health Organization, compared with only five last year, it [China] said, with six dead and many of the others critically ill.

rationale: The segment reports facts and statistics neutrally, lacking high-potency verbs or metaphors.
